summary: AboutSection.tsx was updated to reference the requested image path and includes a non-empty English alt attribute. However, the actual image file was not added under frontend/public/assets/uploads/ in this diff, so the static asset requirement is not met. Additional project metadata/summary files were modified without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the uploaded image file (IMG_20251223_133615~2-6.jpg) to frontend/public/assets/uploads/ so it exists at frontend/public/assets/uploads/IMG_20251223_133615~2-6.jpg.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files; therefore the image asset itself was not added to the repository in the specified location.
evidence: frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSection.tsx (references /assets/uploads/IMG_20251223_133615~2-6.jpg, but asset file not present in diff)
